intro: Timonius glabrior, commonly known as the smooth timonius, is a lesser-known species within the Timonius genus. It is a small shrub characterized by its glabrous, or smooth, foliage and compact growth habit. The plant typically features simple, elliptical leaves with a glossy surface and emits a mild aromatic scent. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Due to its limited distribution and unique botanical traits, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
